desc.en: Murmur is a new-age, blockchain-based, decentralized microblogging platform. Itâ€™s open, transparent, and allows users to monetize their content. Murmur is an independently operated platform, which means it is less corruptible and resistant to regulation. It is a reward-based platform that gives users ability to share freely, control their data and trace the origins of any story to help prevent fake news.
